inputs.description: -sv2 <volparentaligned2.BRIK> [-prefix <fileprefix>]  NOTE: This program is now superseded by SurfToSurf  This program calculates the distance, at each node in Surface 1 (S1) to Surface 2 (S2) The distances are computed along the local surface normal at each node in S1. S1 and S2 are the first and second surfaces encountered in the spec file, respectively.
inputs.name: SV2

inputs.description: Mini help, at time, same as -help in many cases.
inputs.name: H

inputs.description: Open help in text editor. AFNI will try to find a GUI editor
inputs.name: H_VIEW

inputs.description: on your machine. You can control which it should use by setting environment variable AFNI_GUI_EDITOR.
inputs.name: HVIEW

inputs.description: Open help in web browser. AFNI will try to find a browser.
inputs.name: H_WEB

inputs.description: on your machine. You can control which it should use by setting environment variable AFNI_GUI_EDITOR.
inputs.name: HWEB

inputs.description: Look for lines in this programs's -help output that match (approximately) WORD.
inputs.name: H_FIND

inputs.description: Help string in sphinx loveliness, but do not try to autoformat
inputs.name: H_SPX

inputs.description: Help string in sphinx with autoformatting of options, etc.
inputs.name: H_ASPX

inputs.description: Try to identify all options for the program from the output of its -help option. Some options might be missed and others misidentified. Use this output for hints only.   For more help: https://afni.nimh.nih.gov/pub/dist/doc/htmldoc/SUMA/main_toc.html   If you can't get help here, please get help somewhere.  Compile Date: Sep  7 2018   Shruti Japee LBC/NIMH/NIH shruti@codon.nih.gov Ziad S. Saad SSSC/NIMH/NIH saadz@mail.nih.gov
inputs.name: ALL_OPTS
